description:
ZSPACE Private Cloud

ZSPACE is a private cloud product launched by Beijing Zentraedi Intelligence Information Technology Co., Ltd. The ZSPACE client needs to be used together with ZSPACE hardware devices.
ZSPACE products can help you backup photos, videos, and various files from your mobile phone, computer, and tablet to your private hard drive to prevent personal data loss.
ZSPACE provides services such as online photo browsing, online video streaming, music streaming, and book reading anytime, anywhere, and in various network conditions, solving the pain point of not being able to browse or watch files on USB drives or hard drives at any time.
source: 北京天顶星智能信息技术有限公司
